item.title: Mart√≠n Rangel - and i was born water and i was born the flower of loogies
item.description: [y nac√≠ agua y nac√≠ flor de escupitajos] and i was born above the color blue and my sense of smell i was born in another country twenty years gone and i was born again here twenty years gone i never wanted to be eternal i served more realistic purposes like pleasure or poetry i did some semesters of a degree i stared at the sun until my eyes fell apart

item.title: Rom√°n Carrillo - In Case of Emergency
item.description: [Contingencia] we should abandon mexico city like they did teotihuacan let them not know why let the myth go on just that: the myth of the eagle on the nopal without the snake and that one day the eagle decided to fly
